subject: Alpine Skiing
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: In one of the quirks of Alpine men’s super combined, Ivica Kostelic of Croatia, one of the prerace favorites, will be skiing on the slalom half of the racecourse that was designed by his father, Ante.
snippet: In one of the quirks of Alpine men’s super combined, Ivica Kostelic of Croatia, one of the prerace favorites, will be skiing on the slalom half of the racecourse that was designed by his father, Ante.
